H0x61rr0x79 P0x6Ftt0x65r 0x69s 0x61 s0x65r0x690x65s 0x6Ff s0x65v0x65n f0x61nt0x61s0x79 n0x6Fv0x65ls wr0x69tt0x65n b0x79 Br0x69t0x69sh 0x610x75th0x6Fr J. K. R0x6Fwl0x69ng. Th0x65 s0x65r0x690x65s w0x61s 0x6Fr0x69g0x69n0x61ll0x79 p0x75bl0x69sh0x65d 0x69n 0x45ngl0x69sh b0x79 Bl0x6F0x6Fmsb0x75r0x79 0x69n th0x65 0x55n0x69t0x65d K0x69ngd0x6Fm 0x61nd Sch0x6Fl0x61st0x69c Pr0x65ss 0x69n th0x65 0x55n0x69t0x65d St0x61t0x65s. 0x41 s0x65r0x690x65s 0x6Ff m0x61n0x79 g0x65nr0x65s, 0x69ncl0x75d0x69ng f0x61nt0x61s0x79, dr0x61m0x61, c0x6Fm0x69ng-0x6Ff-0x61g0x65 f0x69ct0x690x6Fn, 0x61nd th0x65 Br0x69t0x69sh sch0x6F0x6Fl st0x6Fr0x79 (wh0x69ch 0x69ncl0x75d0x65s 0x65l0x65m0x65nts 0x6Ff m0x79st0x65r0x79, thr0x69ll0x65r, 0x61dv0x65nt0x75r0x65, h0x6Frr0x6Fr, 0x61nd r0x6Fm0x61nc0x65), th0x65 w0x6Frld 0x6Ff H0x61rr0x79 P0x6Ftt0x65r 0x65xpl0x6Fr0x65s n0x75m0x65r0x6F0x75s th0x65m0x65s 0x61nd 0x69ncl0x75d0x65s m0x61n0x79 c0x75lt0x75r0x61l m0x650x61n0x69ngs 0x61nd r0x65f0x65r0x65nc0x65s.[1] M0x61j0x6Fr th0x65m0x65s 0x69n th0x65 s0x65r0x690x65s 0x69ncl0x75d0x65 pr0x65j0x75d0x69c0x65, c0x6Frr0x75pt0x690x6Fn, m0x61dn0x65ss, 0x61nd d0x650x61th.[2][3]
